articles.title: 'Passengers Must Remain In Rooms': Cruise Cut Short After Covid Case - NDTV
articles.description: A passenger aboard a Royal Caribbean 'cruise-to-nowhere' from Singapore has tested positive for COVID-19, forcing around 2,000 guests to be quarantined in their cabins and the Quantum of the Seas ship to return to dock on Wednesday.
articles.content:
Royal Caribbean's 'cruises-to-nowhere' from Singapore began last week.

articles.description: Key support levels for the Nifty are placed at 13324.17, followed by 13255.33. If the index moves up, the key resistance levels to watch out for are 13448.67 and 13504.33.
